<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable/disable caustics drawing.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''enableCaustics''' bool

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> bool: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableCaustics]] [[true]]</code>
</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">
Setting this to false will disable a light refraction on "liquid" objects like sea water. This has no effect on solid (static) objects. 
</dd>
